23  # 周辺環境設定
24  md.add_object('BOX', 'box', [0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0,0,0], (0.1,0.1,0.1))
25  md.add_object('BOX', 'box1', [-0.3, -0.3, 0.3, 0,0,0], (0.1,0.1,0.1))
26  md.add_object('BOX', 'box2', [-0.1, -0.3, 0.4, 0,0,0], (0.01,0.4,0.3))
27  md.add_object('BOX', 'box3', [-0.3, -0.1, 0.4, 0,0,0], (0.4,0.01,0.3))
28 
29  # オブジェクトの姿勢を取得
30  obj_pose = md.scene.get_object_poses(['box','box1'])
31  p = obj_pose['box']
32  pose = [p.position.x,p.position.y,p.position.z+0.05, 3.14, 0, 0]
33  p = obj_pose['box1']
34  pose1 = [p.position.x,p.position.y,p.position.z+0.15, 3.14, 0, 0]
35 
36  md.plan_and_move(group, list_to_pose(pose))
37  md.attach_object('box',group)
38 
39  md.plan_and_move(group, list_to_pose(pose1))
40  md.detach_object('box',group)
41 
42  md.plan_and_move(group, list_to_pose(pose))
43 
44  md.rem_object()
